content: this dress may be adapted to any size doll by increasing the size of the hook or yarn type along with adding or subtracting row of the bodice and/or skirt i used an e crochet hook to get the size of dress i needed for my doll see also matching sun hat plain or ruffled instruction are written with and without the optional ruffles **stitches** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch v_stitch = double_crochet ch1 double_crochet **gauge ** 2 inches x 2 inches = 5 row double_crochet x 8 double_crochet or = 5 row x 4 v-stitches
